title: Coronavirus: Australian mayor seen drinking beer fined for rule breach
description: The mayor in Australia’s Victoria state apologises after breaching his own social-distancing advice.
content:
Image copyrightWarrnambool City CouncilImage caption
 The mayor said he believed he was acting "within the bounds of the law"
A mayor in the Australian state of Victoria has been fined for breaching coronavirus restrictions after he was pictured drinking a … [+3022 chars]
